docs.snippet: The smugglers who helped Los Angeles Dodgers star Yasiel Puig leave Cuba on a speedboat have made death threats against him and against a Cuban boxer who says he defected with Puig, according to court documents....
docs.lead_paragraph: The smugglers who helped Los Angeles Dodgers star Yasiel Puig leave Cuba on a speedboat have made death threats against him and against a Cuban boxer who says he defected with Puig, according to court documents.

headline.main: Affidavit: Smuggler Threats Follow Puig From Cuba
headline.print_headline: Affidavit: Smuggler Threats Follow Puig From Cuba

docs.snippet: Bartering and selling at conventions and online, the thousands of mostly teenage “sneakerheads” have perfected the art of trading up....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bartering and selling at conventions and online, the thousands of mostly teenage “sneakerheads” have perfected the art of trading up.
docs.abstract: Sneaker-obsessed teenagers have formed a thriving subculture using Instagram, Facebook and weekend conventions to spot, sell and trade coveted, sometimes limited-edition pairs of basketball shoes; it is the latest phase of the sports footwear craze that began in the mid-1980s with the debut of Air Jordans.

headline.main: For Young Traders, a Market Where Air Jordans Are Blue Chips
headline.print_headline: At ‘Sneakerhead’ Fairs, Air Jordans Are Golden

docs.snippet: The Cardinals' first batter sent a seemingly routine grounder to Nationals shortstop Ian Desmond, who failed to field the ball cleanly for one of his two errors on the evening. The next hitter's swinging bunt was grabbed by pitcher Taylor Jordan, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Cardinals' first batter sent a seemingly routine grounder to Nationals shortstop Ian Desmond, who failed to field the ball cleanly for one of his two errors on the evening. The next hitter's swinging bunt was grabbed by pitcher Taylor Jordan, but he could not manage to get the ball out of his glove.

headline.main: Nationals Make 4 Errors in 8-0 Loss to Cardinals
headline.print_headline: Nationals Make 4 Errors in 8-0 Loss to Cardinals

docs.snippet: Soccer, particularly England’s Premier League, is being adopted by the creative circles in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer, particularly England’s Premier League, is being adopted by the creative circles in the United States.
docs.abstract: Soccer, once largely ignored in America, is fast becoming favorite sport of creative types who are attracted by its aesthetic, Europhilic allure and fashionable otherness.

headline.seo: Soccer, Particularly England’s Premier League, Growing in Popularity in New York Creative Circles

docs.snippet: Gabriel Garcia Marquez, the Nobel laureate whose intoxicating novels and short stories exposed millions outside Latin America to its passions, superstition, violence and social inequality, died at home in Mexico City on Thursday. He was 87....
